scripts.execute_tests:ollama: npx --yes genaiscript run promptpex_execute_tests --vars "models=ollama:phi3.5;ollama:qwen2.5:3b;ollama:llama3.2:3b;ollama:llama3.1:8b;ollama:gemma2:9b" --vars concurrency=1 --model ollama:phi3.5
scripts.execute_tests:azure_serverless: npx --yes genaiscript run promptpex_execute_tests --vars "models=azure_serverless:gpt-4o-mini" --vars concurrency=3 --model azure_serverless:gpt_4o
scripts.execute_tests:github: npx --yes genaiscript run promptpex_execute_tests --vars "models=github:gpt-4o-mini" --vars concurrency=3 --model github:gpt_4o
